mapper.select: SELECT ceo_idx, ceo_store, ceo_menu_img1, ceo_main_menu FROM ceo_tp WHERE (ceo_main_menu LIKE '%찜%' OR ceo_main_menu LIKE '%국%' OR ceo_main_menu LIKE '%탕%' OR ceo_main_menu LIKE '%밥%');
SELECT ceo_idx, ceo_store, ceo_menu_img1, ceo_main_menu FROM ceo_tp WHERE (ceo_main_menu LIKE '%스시%' OR ceo_main_menu LIKE '%회%' OR ceo_main_menu LIKE '%까%') ;
SELECT ceo_idx, ceo_store, ceo_menu_img1, ceo_main_menu FROM ceo_tp WHERE (ceo_main_menu LIKE '%중%' OR ceo_main_menu LIKE '%짜%' OR ceo_main_menu LIKE '%짬%') ;
SELECT ceo_idx, ceo_store, ceo_menu_img1, ceo_main_menu FROM ceo_tp WHERE (ceo_main_menu LIKE '%디너%' OR ceo_main_menu LIKE '%피자%') ;
SELECT ceo_store, ceo_main_menu, ceo_city_address FROM ceo_tp WHERE (ceo_store LIKE '%#{ceo_store}%' AND ceo_main_menu LIKE '%#{ceo_main_menu}%' AND ceo_city_address LIKE '%#{ceo_city_address}%');
SELECT ceo_idx, ceo_menu_img1, ceo_store, ceo_score, ceo_follow_cnt FROM ceo_tp ORDER BY ceo_score DESC LIMIT 0, 9;
SELECT ceo_idx, ceo_menu_img1, ceo_store, ceo_score, ceo_follow_cnt FROM ceo_tp ORDER BY ceo_follow_cnt DESC LIMIT 0, 10;
